title: Inline Text Editing — Builder
description:
In order to make it more intuitive for customers to edit text, Walmart have requested the ability to edit in-line on rWeb.

Due to concerns about the legibility to small font sizes, we'd like a modal to appear beneath the slot when the text size is beneath a certain size - this is made more complex due to products showing the same font size differently (e.g. 40pt text for [this blanket|https://photos2.walmart.com/project_edit/standard/1f7c1ad918f5f95198e6b99a8502fd51o85080440] is presented differently to 40pt text for [this card|https://photos2.walmart.com/project_edit/card/c58daa8e29e89e802688cdf5fa0cde16o85080441])

UX for how the tray and canvas area should appear for both above and below the threshold is [here](https://www.figma.com/proto/pFgzKkIgse6gQ53kQnzcoN/Inline-text---Hidden-Options?node-id=0%3A1&scaling=min-zoom&page-id=0%3A1).
